Summary Note:
Díaz Torres Vázquez and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Copenhagen. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Díaz Torres Vázquez is a seasoned professional with over 14 years of experience.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Díaz Torres Vázquez and Emma have been married since 2018. They are proud parents of 1 child: Clara.
Education Background:
Díaz graduated from Instituto de Bachillerato Artístico IES Reina Sofia Tenerife in 2005.
In 2010, Díaz graduated from University of Seville with a degree.
Occupation History:
Díaz Torres Vázquez is a 37 year old and comes from Denmark.
Díaz Torres Vázquez's first role was as a Junior Trader at A.P. Moller - Maersk A/S, where he worked diligently from 2011 to 2014 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Norden A/S as a Senior Trader, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2016 till now.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 70000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
He is cautious about investing and prefers to seek professional advice before making decisions.
He owns townhouse in Aarhus, where he resides. It is worth 1440000 DKK.

He purchased condo in Córdoba, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 910000 DKK.
In 2017, he received an inheritance of 9810000 DKK from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
